about_the_game:
A cute, fun platformer for all ages. Travel though the arctic,caves and ocean. Eat fish along the way, and make your way to the factory. Play as PIP, or Owl, and take back the arctic from the evil oil drilling company's CEO!!

During your travels, you will meet various characters to help you along the quest; while helping them with tasks along the way!

You may encounter puzzles, obstacles and find new expansive worlds. Dive into water caves and find hidden treasures! You will feel the classic platformer Nostalgia, of an old era!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 8.1
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 3550 @ 3.3 GHz or AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon R7 370 or NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660/570
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Motherboard Sound Or Higher

  • Processor: Intel Core i7 4790K @ 4.00 GHz or AMD Ryzen 7 5800X3D
